# AppClipAppStoreReviewDetailUpdateRequest

**Object**

The request body you use to update App Clip information that you provide to App Store Review.

## Declaration

```swift
object AppClipAppStoreReviewDetailUpdateRequest
```

## Objects

- **AppClipAppStoreReviewDetailUpdateRequest.Data**: The data element of the request body.

## Objects

- **AppClipAppStoreReviewDetail**: The data structure that represents an App Clip App Store Review Details resource.
- **AppClipAppStoreReviewDetailResponse**: A response that contains a single App Clip App Store Review Details resource.
- **AppClipAppStoreReviewDetailCreateRequest**: The request body you use to create an App Clip App Store Review Detail.
